oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of Confederate Capt. Benjamin Price Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Capt. Wright was born in Bedford County, Va. but had move to Gibson County, Tenn. before the war. He apparently returned to Virginia when the war began and served in Capt. E. L. Walker's Guards which became Co. A, 58th Va. Inf. Regt., CSA. He was wounded at the battle of McDowell, in Highland County, Va. on May 8, 1862 and was sent home, badly wounded, with a broken thigh.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wright, Benjamin Price
